#Text=Jinora says : " Light on your feet , Uncle Bumi .
#Text=I 've been in a scrap or two you know .
#Text=Ha ha .
#Text=Oh , you 're just a youngster , so I 'm gon na go easy on ya .
#Text=Would n't want to hurt a kid ... " Bumi says : " Oh .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Uncle Bumi , you 've got to work on your stance changes .
#Text=Kai , that was just , really good .
#Text=" Kai says : " Thanks Jinora , you 're a great teacher .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Hmm , did I drop my wallet ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Give me that , you little thief !
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's so exciting to be on a diplomatic mission to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=What 's the Earth Queen like ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 've never met her , but I 've heard she can be quite ... demanding .
#Text=" Bolin says : " This is it , Mako !
#Text=We made it !
#Text=This is where Dad grew up !
#Text=Come here !
#Text=Look , look !
#Text=" Mako says : " Okay , calm down , I 'm looking .
#Text=" Korra says : " I wonder how many airbenders are down there .
#Text="
